title: YOLO-APD: Enhancing YOLOv8 for Robust Pedestrian Detection on Complex Road Geometries
summary: Autonomous vehicle perception systems require robust pedestrian detection, particularly on geometrically complex roadways like Type-S curved surfaces, where standard RGB camera-based methods face limitations. This paper introduces YOLO-APD, a novel deep learning architecture enhancing the YOLOv8 framework specifically for this challenge.
